items.name: crowbar
items.description: A heavy iron bar. Perfect for forcing doors.

usability.effectDescription: You wedge the crowbar into the door's seam and pull. With a screech, it pries open.

items.name: bolt cutters
items.description: Industrial-strength cutters. Can sever thick chains.

usability.effectDescription: The bolt cutters slice through the chain with effort. The way is now clear.

items.name: fuse
items.description: A 20-amp electrical fuse. Might restore power.

usability.effectDescription: You slot the fuse into place. The generator hums to life.
usability.changesRoomDescriptionTo: The room is now brightly lit. Electricity flows through the cables.

items.name: wrench
items.description: A rusted but usable wrench. Could loosen bolts.

usability.effectDescription: You insert the key into the control panel. The sparks die down, and the gate powers off.
usability.changesRoomDescriptionTo: The control panel glows green. The gate is safe to touch.

items.name: rusty chest
items.description: A small, sturdy chest bound with rusty iron bands. It appears to be locked.

items.name: small key
items.description: A small, tarnished brass key. Seems designed for a simple lock.

usability.effectDescription: You insert the small key into the lock of the rusty chest and turn. *Click!* The lid springs open.

items.name: open chest
items.description: The chest is now open, revealing its contents.

items.name: health potion
items.description: A vial containing a bubbling red liquid.

usability.effectDescription: You drink the potion. You feel invigorated!

items.name: gold coin
items.description: A gleaming coin of pure gold. Must be valuable.

rooms.name: Basement Cell
rooms.description: A concrete prison cell. The only light comes from under a metal door (north). A vent cover (east) is loose.

rooms.name: Metal Door
rooms.description: A reinforced steel door. The handle is broken off.

rooms.name: Vent Tunnel
rooms.description: A cramped air duct. It leads to a larger room (north) and back to the cell (west).

rooms.name: Boiler Room
rooms.description: A hot, noisy room with a broken generator (needs fuse). A toolbox sits on a shelf.

rooms.name: Utility Hall
rooms.description: A long hallway with flickering lights. A chained door (north) blocks the exit.

rooms.name: Chained Door
rooms.description: A heavy door secured by industrial chains. The links look cuttable.

rooms.name: Generator Room
rooms.description: A dark room humming with electricity. The main generator (needs key) powers the exit gate (east).

rooms.name: Exit Gate
rooms.description: An electrified gate. The control panel sparks dangerously.
